_sText:
Okay, so I really like this map, its only downfall were the doors. It usually lead to door spamming and then everyone would get killed by the AFK killer.

So, I removed most of the doors, fixed a few errors and kept all the sounds and textures in place.
The only doors left are like 4 near the end, which I increased the opening speed of.


I do not take any credit for this map, all credit goes to jake1002 (http://www.fpsbanana.com/members/276564)


EDIT: Fixed problem with no respawnblocker.
